Welcome!!

You have it absolutely right... art goes in the Photos section and 
fiction in the Archive of Stories folder in the Files section.  Be 
sure to check out the guidelines for posting and uploading, fiction 
particularly.

I'm sure everyone here will enjoy new art & fic!

phil
